github.desc: For transparency, wanderer.moe is Open Source on GitHub. The code is available for anyone to view and contribute to.

donate.title: Donate
donate.desc: wanderer.moe is ad-free and will always be free to use. If you enjoy the site and want to help with server costs, maintenance and development, consider donating.

discord.desc: Join the discord server for site updates, assets not on the site, and more

asset.info: Tap on an asset to select it, double tap an image to enlarge it.
asset.nothingFoundSuggestions: If there's an asset you're looking for that you want added, fill out the asset request form.
asset.onMobile: If you're having issues downloading, read the FAQ by pressing the info symbol next to the game's name.

globalSearch.searchBar: Search for a game or asset

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.purpose: Vad är syftet med denna webbsida?
faq.purposeAnswer: wanderer.moe is a website that hosts a collection of assets from various games. The assets are organized by game and asset type, the sake of this website is to provide a centralized location for people to download assets from.
faq.downloadMultipleOrAll: How do I download multiple or all assets?
faq.downloadMultipleOrAllAnswer: To download multiple, select the assets you want to download by clicking/tapping on them. Then click the 'Download Selected' button. To download all assets, click the 'Download All' button. This will save as a zip file into your downloads folder.
faq.downloadOnMobile: How do I download assets on mobile?
faq.downloadOnMobileAnswer: Se till så att du inte är på sidan genom någon slags Social Media app, men i en inbyggd webbläsare på din telefon. Om du är på iPhone, rekommenderar jag att du använder Safari.
faq.howToExtract: How do I extract the zip file after downloading?
faq.howToExtractAnswer: If you are on Windows, you can use 7zip to extract the files. If you are on Mac, you can use the built in Archive Utility. If you are on iPhone, tap on the .zip file, open the folder it creates, select the images and then 'Save to Photos'. If you are on Android, you can use a file manager app to extract the files.
faq.issueNotFound: Jag har problem som inte står här.
faq.issueNotFoundAnswer: Om du har ett problem som inte står här, kan du gå med i discord-servern och fråga om hjälp där.

errors.refresh: Try refreshing the page or go back to the home page
errors.apiError: An error occurred while making a request to the API, try again or refresh the page.
